name: Sinsations
description:
In Sinsations, a BL / Yaoi Visual Novel, you take on the role of Kosuke Arai, Lucifer's newest Deadly Sin of Lust. But there's a catch. You need to seduce the other six Deadly Sins, to prove to Lucifer you're up to the task.

Game features:

  • Full voice acting
  • Numerous choices, numerous endings
  • Uncensored 18+ artwork
  • Six love interests
  • 280k word count story
